com.palomamobile.android.sdk.auth

Interface IAuthService


  • public interface IAuthService
    IAuthService provides API calls to retrieve Client and User tokens. This class provides somewhat low level access to the Server API it may be more convenient to use methods in IAuthManager.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AccessToken getClientAccessToken(String authorizationValue, String requestId, String grantType)
      Retrieve Client access token.
      AccessToken getUserAccessToken(String authorizationValue, String requestId, String userName, String passsword, String credentialType, String grantType)
      Retrieve User access token based on user credentials.
      AccessToken refreshUserAccessToken(String authorizationValue, String requestId, String grantType, String refreshToken)
      Retrieve a new User access token based on a refresh token.

    • Method Detail

      • getClientAccessToken

        AccessToken getClientAccessToken(String authorizationValue,
                               String requestId,
                               String grantType)
        Retrieve Client access token.
        Parameters:
        authorizationValue - base64 encoded basic auth header with client id and client password
        requestId - of the request that triggered this method call
        grantType - requires client_credentials
        Returns:
        client access token

      • getUserAccessToken

        AccessToken getUserAccessToken(String authorizationValue,
                             String requestId,
                             String userName,
                             String passsword,
                             String credentialType,
                             String grantType)
        Retrieve User access token based on user credentials.
        Parameters:
        authorizationValue - base64 encoded basic auth header with client id and client password
        requestId - of the request that triggered this method call
        userName -
        passsword -
        credentialType - supported values are password or facebook
        grantType - requires password
        Returns:
        AccessToken which also includes a AccessToken.refreshToken

      • refreshUserAccessToken

        AccessToken refreshUserAccessToken(String authorizationValue,
                                 String requestId,
                                 String grantType,
                                 String refreshToken)
        Retrieve a new User access token based on a refresh token.
        Parameters:
        authorizationValue - base64 encoded basic auth header with client id and client password
        requestId - of the request that triggered this method call
        grantType - requires refresh_token
        refreshToken - refresh token value as previously returned in AccessToken.refreshToken from getUserAccessToken(String, String, String, String, String, String)
        Returns:
